Simon Cowell is apparently planning to unveil his US line-up as early as next week, and if he take Cheryl Cole and Dermot with him, it will cause major headaches for ITV. A show source said: ITV is pulling out all the stops to ensure Simon Cowell can do both shows, but he still hasn't agreed anything, which is frustrating. If Cheryl Cole and Dermot also have to travel back and forth it could be tricky. The last thing they want is for any of them to pull out.

Allen Iverson had his left knee drained before the game for the second time this week and will have an MRI on Thursday.`` This one's on me. I let us down tonight,'' Allen Iverson said. I feel bad, that's a game we should have won. We didn't make shots at the time we needed to make shots. Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business, Billy Joel said in a statement.`` At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists.''
